TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ViewStateException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ViewStateException Inherits Exception
public ref class ViewStateException sealed : Exception

summary.span: 表示当无法加载或验证视图状态时引发的异常。

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when the view state cannot be loaded or validated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果加载的页面的视图状态信息时，则会发生异常，则该页创建对象并将它传递作为内部异常中异常。If an exception occurs when the page loads the view-state information, the page creates a object and passes it as an inner exception within an exception. 异常被重新引发，由应用程序处理。The exception is re-thrown to be handled by the application. 类存储有关中的异常信息属性。The class stores information about the exception in the property. 如果请求具有访问权限属性，则属性包含从返回的值， ， ， ， ，和属性：否则为属性包含一般的视图状态错误消息。If the request has permission to access the property, then the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties; otherwise, the property contains a generic view-state error message. 视图状态异常可以是消息验证代码 (MAC) 验证错误的结果。A view-state exception can be the result of a Message Authentication Codes (MAC) validation error. 如果页特性`enableViewStateMac`设置为`true`，查看状态信息使用 MAC 标识符进行编码。If the page attribute `enableViewStateMac` is set to `true`, view-state information is encoded with a MAC identifier. 当视图状态信息回发到服务器时，该页会验证以确保它具有不被更改用户的编码。When the view-state information is posted back to the server, the page verifies the encoding to ensure that it has not been altered by the user. 如果该页无法验证的视图状态信息的 MAC 编码，则会引发异常作为内部异常的对象。If the page cannot validate the MAC encoding on the view-state information, it will throw an exception with the object as an inner exception. 对于 MAC 验证成功，视图状态信息必须进行哈希处理由相同的密钥时发送和接收。For MAC validation to succeed, the view-state information must be hashed by the same key when it is sent and received. 在网络场中，每个服务器上的计算机密钥应设置为公共密钥。Within a Web farm, the machine key on each server should be set to a common key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的方法，反序列化的 base64 编码字符串并返回属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法可能会引发包含异常作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获异常和检索从属性对象。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示客户端当前是否连接在服务器上。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the client is currently connected to the server.

value.span: 如果客户端仍连接在服务器上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client is still connected to the server; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回相同的值调用属性。This property returns the same value as calling the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的方法，反序列化的 base64 编码字符串并返回属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法可能会引发包含异常作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获异常和检索从属性对象。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取导致视图状态异常的 HTTP 请求的调试信息。

span.span: Gets debugging information about the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含格式化消息以及有关异常的信息。

span.span: A containing the formatted message with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求不包含服务器变量的访问权，则此属性返回一般的视图状态错误消息。If the request does not have permission to access the server variables, then this property returns a generic view-state error message. 如果请求未包含服务器变量的访问权属性包含从返回的值， ， ， ， ，和属性。If the request does have permission to access server variables, the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties.

.property instance string Path
Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取导致视图状态异常的 HTTP 请求的路径。

span.span: Gets the path of the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.
A containing the path from the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回相同的值`PATH_INFO`变量中属性。This property returns the same value as the `PATH_INFO` variable in the property. 它返回后的主机名的路径的一部分。It returns the portion of the path after the host name. 例如，在 URL 中http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html，将返回 /virdir/page.html。For example, in the URL http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html, would return /virdir/page.html. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的方法，反序列化的 base64 编码字符串并返回属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法可能会引发包含异常作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获异常和检索从属性对象。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取视图状态字符串的内容，读取它时导致了视图状态异常。

span.span: Gets the contents of the view-state string that, when read, caused the view-state exception.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含导致视图状态异常的视图状态值。

span.span: A containing the view-state values that caused the view-state exception.

summary.span: 获取页的 URL，该页链接到发生视图状态异常的页。

span.span: Gets the URL of the page that linked to the page where the view-state exception occurred.
A containing the HTTP referrer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回相同的值`HTTP_REFERER`变量中属性。This property returns the same value as the `HTTP_REFERER` variable in the property. 值为空字符串 ("") 如果没有以前的请求链接到页。The value is an empty string ("") if no previous request linked to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的方法，反序列化的 base64 编码字符串并返回属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法可能会引发包含异常作为内部异常的对象。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 该示例演示如何捕获异常和检索从属性对象。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

span.span: A containing the user agent, which is typically the browser type.
